info.title: VideoLibrary API
info.description:
An ASP.NET Core Web API for managing videos in a BLOB storage 

 Use https://editor-next.swagger.io/ when checking the documentation since its writen in version 3.1.0

post.summary: Gets a list of Authors with connection with the specified video
Adds an Author to the specified Video

400.description: Bad request  input parameters are invalid.

delete.summary: Removes an Author from the specified video

200.description: Success response with author-video link data

post.summary: Gets a list of Genres with connection with the specified Video
Adds a Genre to the specified Video

200.description: Success response with genre-video link data

delete.summary: Removes a Genre from the specified Video

200.description: Success response with genre-video link data

post.summary: Gets a list of Tags with connection with the specified Video
Adds a Tag to the specified Video

200.description: Success response with tag-video link data

delete.summary: Removes a Tag from the specified Video
